attributes.action: make roads in and around redditch free from pot holes!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to show your support for redditch against potholes. in and around redditch every single road has a pothole and in many cases more than one. these pot holes are not small dainty ones either they are dangerous to all road users especially motorcyclists. sign this petition to get something done about this constant problem.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
